verses.name: Ephesians 1:17
verses.text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:

verses.name: Ephesians 1:18
verses.text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

verses.name: Ephesians 1:19
verses.text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power,
